The sinne vnto death. Or an ample discouery of that fearefull sinne, the sinne against the holy Ghost together with the signes, degrees and preservatiues thereof. In a sermon preached at Pauls Crosse. August 26. 1621. By Tho: Bedford ... Bedford, Thomas, d. 1653.
[24], 86, [2] p.
Printed by Iohn Dawson for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at the signe of the Starre vnder St Peters-Church in Corne-hill, and i n Popes-head Alley, London : 1621.
The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
